dict.acceptation: 打赌，赌博，赌注；被下赌注的对象；可能性；
赌博；与…打赌；下赌注；确信；

sent.orig: The passivated catalyst was tested or characterized by ONU autothermal apparatus,XRD,DTA and BET.
sent.trans: 对钝化后的催化剂进行了ONU自热测试和XRD、DTA、BET等表征。

sent.orig: The catalysts were further characterized by XRD, BET, and UV-Vis DRS.
sent.trans: 用XRD、BET和紫外可见漫反射(UV-Vis DRS)等方法对这些催化剂进行了表征。

sent.orig: By means of XRD, BET, BJH, TEM and EDS, we had tested the samples.
sent.trans: 通过XRD、BET、BJH、TEM和EDS等手段对样品进行测试分析。

sent.orig: But BET surface area doesn't show any correlation with ink density.
sent.trans: 但是BET表面积与打印油墨密度没有体现相关性。

sent.orig: The BET specific surface area reaches 477.7 m2? g-1 for NiO calcined at 523 K.
sent.trans: 结果表明，在523K下焙烧得到的氧化镍BET比表面达到477.7m~2·g~(-1)。
